Veuillez trouver dans ce dépôt les Meetups issues de la collaboration entre R Lille et Tunis R User Group.

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
source("assets/social.R")
library(glue)

rscript <- list.files(path = "R", pattern = "^20.*\\.R$", full.names = TRUE)
meetup <- sub("\\.R$", "", basename(rscript))
png <- sprintf("meetups/%s/ads/%s.png", meetup, meetup)

outdated <- !file.exists(png) |
  file.mtime(png) < file.mtime(rscript) |
  file.mtime(png) < file.mtime("assets/social.R")

invisible(lapply(rscript[outdated], source, encoding = "UTF-8"))
```

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
img <- glue::glue('<img alt="Poster for {meetup} Meetup" src="{png}" width="192" height="108" />')
png_link <- glue::glue('<a href="meetups/{meetup}">{meetup}</a>')
cell <- paste0('<td align = "center">', img, "<br />", png_link, "</td>")
cols <- 4
rows <- ceiling(length(cell) / cols)
row_id <- rep(seq_len(rows), each = cols, length.out = length(cell))
row_cells <- split(cell, row_id)
cat("<table>\n")
cat(paste0("<tr>", sapply(row_cells, paste, collapse = ""), "</tr>"), sep = "")
cat("</table>\n")
```
